content: That sucks. Haven't seen him in public in like 10 years, either.

title: Actor Dom DeLuise dead at 75

content: The Golden Globe-nominated actor died Monday night at a Los Angeles hospital. He was 75 years old. Deluise is probably best-known for his work in Mel Brooks films like 'Blazing Saddles,' 'Silent Movie,' 'History Of The World Part One,' 'Space Balls,' 'Robin Hood: Men in Tights,' and co-starring with Burt Reynolds in films like 'Cannonball Run,' 'Smokey and The Bandit 2' and 'The Best Little *****house in Texas.' He also hosted the popular TV show "Candid Camera" from 1991-1992. Dom was an avid cook and author, penning several cooking guides and children's books. >>>http://www.cbsnews.com/stories/2009/05/05/entertainment/main4992353.shtml?tag=topHome;topStories >>>http://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/30581493/
